channel.title: Help Please .. Connection problems
channel.description:
Hey guys, I made my server recently, And when i came to connecting to it, I can connect using 127.0.0.1 But not my own ip. But also i can connect if i use hamachi.
Info: I Can't port forward the router/modem as my dad has changed the password so i can't connect to it.
Edit: My friend can also connect by using my hamachi ip but not my ip or my no-ip.info
Thanks in advance :)

item.title: Help Please .. Connection problems
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

It doesn’t work for no-ip because you haven’t portfoward… Why don’t you just look on cookies and see if you can find router password? Lol, i did. Also, why don’t you portfoward using UTorrent?

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please .. Connection problems

item.description:
@greyfang wrote:

Hey guys,
I made my server recently,
And when i came to connecting to it,
I can connect using 127.0.0.1
But not my own ip.
But also i can connect if i use hamachi.

I Can’t port forward the router/modem as my dad has changed the password so i can’t connect to it.

Edit: My friend can also connect by using my hamachi ip but not my ip or my no-ip.info
